overview: Thomas co-founded New Science Ventures in 2004, and as CFO of NSV has responsibility for all financial, legal and administrative matters. He serves on the Board of Directors for RF Arrays and Oxyrane, and is an observer to the boards of Silicon Space Technology and Payzy. Prior to starting New Science Ventures, he was a senior professional in real estate finance and investment for 30 years. He was head of real estate investment banking at First Boston and Smith Barney and head of commercial mortgage lending at MetLife. Thomas received his undergraduate degree in Government from Wesleyan University and his M.B.A. from Harvard Business School.
